Struct template result<const this_type(ContextT)>

boost::log::expressions::attribute_terminal::result<const this_type(ContextT)>

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/log/expressions/attr.hpp>


template<typename ContextT> 
struct result<const this_type(ContextT)> {
  // types
  typedef remove_cv< typename remove_reference< typename phoenix::result_of::env< ContextT >::type >::type >::type                             env_type; 
  typedef env_type::args_type                                                                                                                  args_type;
  typedef boost::result_of< const value_extractor_type(attribute_name const &, typename fusion::result_of::at_c< args_type, 0 >::type) >::type type;     
};
